verses.text: O \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, my heart is not haughty, my eyes are not lofty, I walk not among great things, things too wonderful for me.
Yes, I have soothed and stilled myself, like a young child on his motherâ€™s lap; like a young child am I.
O Israel, hope in the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*from now and for evermore.
